Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: リフトの管理人の家
Entry.EnglishText: Lift Caretaker

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that you can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women...

Entry.JapaneseText: 祭司はヒューマにこそ、 ふさわしいんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: The position of priest is only fit for Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>蒼獣聖典<White>には こう書いてある。
Entry.EnglishText: It's what's written in the <Blue>Azure Beast's Scriptures<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「知恵をもって蒼獣の教えを よく悟り、よく知る、 尊き蒼獣の徒ヒューマ。 良き信仰者となり、蒼獣を護れ」
Entry.EnglishText: "Take to heart the wise teachings of the Azure Beast, o noble Huma! Be a good believer and obey the Azure Beast!"

Entry.JapaneseText: 祭司こそ、ヒューマに 与えられた役目なんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: That's why Huma are always chosen to be priests!

Entry.JapaneseText: リフトの管理人の家？ ほれ、すぐ正面に 見えとるのがそうじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: The lift operator's house? Well, it's just in front of you, dearie.

Entry.JapaneseText: それよりも一緒に 日向ぼっこでも…… どうじゃ？
Entry.EnglishText: Or better yet, would you like to sunbathe with me?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、みにくい…… ヒューマは、なんて みにくい姿形をしとるんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Ugly... So ugly... Huma have such an ugly appearance!

Entry.JapaneseText: あたしがヒューマの姿だったら 海に身投げするね！
Entry.EnglishText: I'd rather drown myself than be in a Huma's body!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街を追い出された事は 忘れられんよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never forget being chased outside of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、これを恨みにせず、 あたしたちのあるべき形を探せと、 蒼獣様がおっしゃっとるんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: But the Azure Beast said that we should search for what we want to become than hold on to this grudge...

Entry.JapaneseText: この音が気になって、 蒼獣様へのお祈りにも 集中できないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been trying to pray to the Azure Beast, but I can't concentrate with this sound...

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様……蒼獣様…… どうかこの小さな年寄りを お助けくださいませ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh Azure Beast... Azure Beast... Please save this tiny old lady...

Entry.JapaneseText: ひなたぼっこ日和じゃ…… おまえさんも一緒にどうかの？
Entry.EnglishText: What a perfect day in the sun... Do you want to join me?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
